front.title: Privacy-Enhanced Tokens for Authorization in ACE

abstract.t: This specification defines PAT, "Privacy-Enhanced-Authorization- Tokens" or "Pseudonym-based Authorization Tokens", a protocol and a token construction procedure for client authorization in a constrained environment. This memo also specifies a profile for ACE framework for Authentication and Authorization for constrained environments. This draft uses CBOR Web Token (CWT) and CBOR Object Signing and Encryption (COSE) to encode PAT messages.
